view.name: Task Explorer
description: Extension to add support for tasks in VSCode.
config.taskExplorer.autoRefresh: Auto refresh the task trees when a task file is modified.
config.taskExplorer.autoRefreshDeprecate: Why did it exist in the first place
config.taskExplorer.enableExplorerView: Add a task explorer tray in the Explorer sidebar view.
config.taskExplorer.enableSideBar: Add a task explorer to the the sidebar.
config.taskExplorer.enabledTaskTypes: Enabled task types to display in the task tree
config.taskExplorer.exclude: Configure `glob` patterns for folders and files that should be excluded from script detection.
config.taskExplorer.excludeTask: Configure `regex` patterns for individual tasks that should be excluded from task tree inclusion.
config.taskExplorer.expanded: Specify individual (main) tree folders to be either expanded or collapses on startup
config.taskExplorer.globPatternsAnt: Configure glob patterns for locating Apache Ant files not named b(B)uild.xml.
config.taskExplorer.globPatternsBash: Configure the glob patterns for locating bash scripts, can be used to locate scripts with no extension.
config.taskExplorer.groupWithSeparator: If script names contain the configured separator, break them into grouped nodes according to similar fist parts.
config.taskExplorer.groupSeparator: The separator to use when grouping tasks.
config.taskExplorer.groupMaxLevel: Maximum grouping level (tree node depth) of grouped tasks
config.taskExplorer.groupStripTaskLabel: Strip extracted grouping labels from the task name displayed in the tree
config.taskExplorer.includeAntDsc: Configure glob patterns for locating Apache Ant files not named b(B)uild.xml.
config.taskExplorer.keepTermOnStop: Keep terminal open when stopping a task.
config.taskExplorer.logging.enable: Turn on logging. Log messages are written to the `Task Explorer` output window.
config.taskExplorer.logging.enableFile: Enable logging to file (in addition to output window). Has no effect if `#logging.enabled#` is disabled.
config.taskExplorer.logging.level: Set debug verbosity (1 - Low / 5 - High). Has no effect if `#logging.enabled#` is disabled.
config.taskExplorer.pathToPrograms: Paths to programs, if not registered in system path
config.taskExplorer.showHiddenWsTasks: Include VSCode tasks in the explorer tree that have the `hide` property set to `true`.  Has no effect if `workspace` tasks are disabled in `#enabledTasks#`
config.taskExplorer.showRunningTask: Show the most recently started running task in the status bar
config.taskExplorer.sortProjectFoldersAl: Sort project folders alphabetically.  If not set, folders appear in the same order as the File Explorer View.
config.taskExplorer.useAnt: Use the `ant` program itself to find it's tasks.
config.taskExplorer.useGulp: Use the `gulp` program itself to find it's tasks.
config.taskExplorer.specialFolders.expan: Specify tree node expansion states on startup for special folders and project folders.  Property names of new items should be **camel cased** with **no spaces**.  A value of `true` indicates the folder should be expanded on startup, `false` indicates the folder should be collapsed.
config.taskExplorer.specialFolders.numLa: The number of tasks to store in the `Last Tasks` tree folder node
config.taskExplorer.specialFolders.showF: Show a `Favorites` main folder in the task tree to group frequently ran tasks in.
config.taskExplorer.specialFolders.showL: Show `Last Tasks` as a main folder in the task tree.
config.taskExplorer.specialFolders.showU: Display user workspace tasks from data directory.
config.taskExplorer.taskButtons.clickAct: Action to perform when clicking on the main body of a task tree entry
config.taskExplorer.taskButtons.showExec: Show the `Execute with No Terminal` button inline with the Execute button.
Show the `Execute with Arguments` button inline with the Execute button.
config.taskExplorer.taskButtons.showFavo: Show the `Favorites` button inline with the Execute button. Has no effect if `#specialFolders.showFavorites#` is disabled.
config.taskExplorer.visual.disableAnimat: Use static non-animated icons for running tasks as opposed to the spinning icons.
config.taskExplorer.visual.enableAnsicon: Enable/use ansicon output colorization for ant tasks.
taskExplorer.parseError: Task Explorer task detection: failed to parse the file {0}
taskdef.task.fileName: The file that the target was found in.
taskdef.task.fileUri: The uri object of file that the target was found in.
taskdef.task.icon: The icon paths to use in the task tree.  Specify two properties on an object - light and dark
taskdef.task.path: The relative path to the folder that contains the task file.
taskdef.task.uri: The uri of the task file.
taskdef.task.taskItemId: The tree item id that the task is associated with.
taskdef.task.isDefault: For Ant tasks, indicates the 'default' task.
taskdef.task.scriptType: The type of script (bash, batch, python, etc...).
taskdef.task.cmdLine: The command line used to execute the script in a shell.
taskdef.task.scriptFile: Boolean to display filename as the script target. Set to true.
taskdef.task.takesArgs: Boolean to indicate if the script accepts command line args.
command.clearSpecialFolder: Clear all tasks from this folder
